Articles.Content:
Was just messing around with wings and got very weird results with them.

It's probably because the wings cause so much lift that they almost counter gravity when falling in top position.

So the ship is in a very slow fall, and sometimes goes through some weird sudden moments.
I had a similar experience with this ship. A powered lander I threw fins on just for fun. It seems to almost float.
KSP: Classical mechanics? Check. Aerodynamic model? Uh.. still waiting on that one, sir.
